name: absence
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: absence
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: the fact of not being where you are usually expected to be

example.eg: A new manager was appointed during/in her absence.
example.egtrans: 她不在的时候任命了一位新经理。

example.eg: She has had repeated absences from work this year.

dsense.name: absence
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

example.eg: He drew attention to the absence of concrete evidence against the defendant.
example.egtrans: 他使大家注意到，可以证明被告有罪的确凿证据并不存在。

example.eg: In the absence of (= because there were not) more suitable candidates, we decided to offer the job to Mr Conway.
example.egtrans: 由于没有更为合适的人选，我们决定任命康韦先生。
